snippet.title: En Garde! - Trailer (Student game, 2018)
snippet.description:
Download the game: https://engarde-game.com/

En Garde! is our student graduation project made at Supinfogame Rubika from october 2017 to june 2018, with a team of 8 students. The game will be available in June 2018.

Game Credits: 
Adrien Poncet - Producer, Game Director, Sound Designer 
Valentin Capitaine - Game Designer, AI Designer 
Corentin Mangé - Level Designer, Level Builder 
Syvlain Schmück - Gameplay Programmer, 3C designer 
Pierre Chapelet - AI Programmer, Gameplay Programmer 
Julien Fenoglio - Art Director, Concept Artist, 3D Artist
Tim Guthmann - Animator, Technical Artist 
Anaïs Simonnet - Character Artist, 3D Artist

Trailer by Adrien Poncet & Sylvain Schmück, music by Ludwig Wu, Adalia's voice by Ilse Zamarripa.

Twitter to follow for updates on the game: https://twitter.com/leDrien
